item.title: Clown Pup Devlog #0
item.description: Hi! Welcome to our new game’s Devlog, part 0 (tutorial/intro/whatever). What I want to tell you about here is what we’re making, why we’re making it, and why I’m documenting the process here. So, let’s dive right in! Clown Pup was formerly a Ludum Dare 48 submission of me and a couple of friends. It didn’t turn out perfect, but I did like the concept and the art style so we (Skill + Å»aba) decided to come back to this game and make it the right way; longer, less buggy and just an enjoyable experience for people.
